name: Lucid Town Governing Department
description:
Lucid Towns Governing Department is a city building sim game where you need to develop two cities simultaneously, all while keeping excitement of the citizens in both cities balanced.

How to play:

  • Build your cities using the blocks (we call it "property") provided on your right. These blocks will increase or decrease excitement point.
  • You can pick, rotate, and swap the piece of property in your hand with another in the conveyor.
  • There are 11 kinds of properties with their respective excitement point. Any properties put in the city may affect city's excitement point.
  • When the land provided is getting too crowded, a button will appear on the bottom. Press this to start building on a new plot of land, with the excitement score of that land carried over.
  • Each city has their own excitement value as you can see on the bottom. Make sure this never reaches zero or below!
  • Also make sure that the difference between the two excitements never reaches above 140 or else the citizens will protest and game over!
  • Don't forget to use all the blocks on the conveyor. If its too full the citizens will also protest and game over!
